title: AES Shipment Creation and Submission
description: Allows users to create new export shipment filings with all necessary header and party information, ensuring compliance with basic AES requirements.
functionality: Input/capture required shipment header data (e.g., USPPI, Consignee, Dates, Mode of Transport).
Input/capture Forwarding Agent/Authorized Agent profile information.
Specify Port of Export and Destination Country.
Specify Mode of Transport (Air, Truck, Vessel, etc.).
Transmit the created shipment data to CBP AES.
benefits: Enables electronic filing of export information as required by regulations.
Streamlines the process of initiating an export declaration.
Ensures basic required data elements are captured.
